long_description: Why spend time indoors when you can enjoy effortless lounging at your favorite campsite or city park with the Alite Mantis Chair?. Mantis chair sets up quickly and easily using an aluminum hub and pole system similar to the design found in many lightweight tents. Sits higher off the ground than other Alite chair designs, making it easier to get in and out of. 4 feet provide a strong and stable platform. Lightweight nylon fabric features breathable mesh panels on the sides. Alite Mantis Chair has a maximum capacity of 250 lbs. Packs down and fits in the included stuff sack for easy storage and transportation.
short_description: Why spend time indoors when you can enjoy effortless lounging at your favorite campsite or city park with the Alite Mantis Chair?.
